Shivah::

Shivah typed some buttons of his comm link (In order to anyone else 
over Orchestra could heard) and he said 

"I guess that you know that Blacknightmare's in IGL, your mission now 
is bring her back "Shivah tought a sec and added"Orchestra, I'm 
afraid that something it's wrong, she haven't reported since she left 
Infectron's base. Due that we need her back in order to find out how 
she could leave Infectrons' base... That information will be useful 
in our battles against Infectrons"

"Perhaps"thought the male "She's betraying us..."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@h...> wrote:
> ::Orchestra::
> 
> Orchestra landed at Blackfortress.
> 
> "Shivah," Orchestra said through comm-link, "What are my next 
orders?"
> 
> Orchestra stored the spark container in his back.
> 
> 
> 
> ~The Keeper of Souls~
> ~The Shadow of the Dark~
> ~I Am, The Lurker of the Abyss~
